about_the_game:
Vantastic is a co-op road trip game in a diverse, infinitely generated world. The game gives you freedom, driving, survival and fun co-op elements all in one. Choose to play solo or with friends (with friends is always better). Also enjoy party games including: drunk driving, racing and more.

FEATURES YOU CAN EXPECT:
    [*Procedurally generated world meaning every adventure is different. *Fully integrated multiplayer meaning you can share all the experiences with friends. *Huge variety of game mechanics which you can play around with.]

Vantastic comes with the main game, alongside many fun coop party games.
